name: Denis

services.title: Communication and Collaboration
services.description: Front-end/back-end integration, coordination with stakeholders, writing detailed specification documents.

services.title: Time and Organization Management
services.description: Meeting deadlines, task planning and prioritization, adapting to changes and changing situations.

services.title: Problem Solving
services.description: Debugging and bug fixing, identifying and correcting performance issues, critical thinking and impartial analysis.

services.title: Agility and Adaptability
services.description: Integrating changes during a project, bouncing back from obstacles and unforeseen events, questioning and evolving the project.

services.title: React
services.description: Development of reactive user interfaces, state management with Redux, routing with React Router.

services.title: Node.js & Express
services.description: Creation of REST APIs, front-end/back-end integration, execution of JavaScript code on the server-side.

services.title: MongoDB
services.description: Use of a NoSQL database, data modeling and persistence.

services.title: Swagger
services.description: API documentation, description of API routes and actions.

services.title: Development Tools
services.description: Chrome DevTools, React Developer Tools, Yarn, Lighthouse, Wave for performance auditing.

aboutpara: A web explorer searching for the answers that everyone ponders. I develop at my own pace to combine efficiency and reflection, weaving web experiences imbued with a balance between materiality and spirituality, between technological progress and respect for our natural world.‚úåÔ∏è
